Description: In St. Petersburg, an accused of contract murder went to war instead of trialSt. -The St. Petersburg City Court suspended the criminal case of Alexander Sukharev - the judges accepted his petition to be sent to war. -This petition is motivated by the fact that the defendant entered into a contract for military service during the period of mobilization in the RF Armed Forces. He was found fit and accepted for military service under a contract,- reported the joint press service of the courts of St. Petersburg. The court also canceled Sukharev's detention in a pre-trial detention center and released him.Sukharev is accused of contract killing of the Monolit construction company Viktor Aliyev on June 5, 2023. According to investigators, early that day at the construction site, he shot Aliyev in the head, neck and torso at least 7 times with a pistol (on video). Aliyev died on the spot. Sukharev is an experienced criminal. In the 2000s, he was a member of the -Kingisepp- group, wrote 47 News. In 2007, a jury found him not guilty in the case of a series of contract killings of this organized crime group. True, on the eve of this decision, two of the jurors simply did not come to the meeting, because of this the panel had to be dissolved and re-recruited. In 2016, Sukharev was detained on suspicion of a series of robberies against jewelry stores. Then he was released on bail. In this case, already during the trial of the murder of Aliyev, the killer Sukharev was sentenced to 12 years in prison.

Description: The head of the trade union of the Ural plant was arrested for 14 days because of a repost of Navalny‚Äôs video made 6 years ago.
